nestor 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Select the k first components and their complement as initial cliques

complement_spca.Rd

This function aims at efficiently exploring the space of likely cliques when only one missing actor is estimated.

complement_spca(Y, k)

Arguments

Y

count dataset
k

number of principal components of sparse PCA to keep

Value

a list of 2*k cliques

Examples

data=missing_from_scratch(n=100,p=10,r=1,type="scale-free", plot=TRUE)
data$TC
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 1 2 4 8
#> 
complement_spca(data$Y,k=2)
#> [[1]]
#> [[1]][[1]]
#> [1] 1 8
#> 
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [[2]][[1]]
#> [1]  7 10
#> 
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [[3]][[1]]
#> [1]  2  3  4  5  6  7  9 10
#> 
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [[4]][[1]]
#> [1] 1 2 3 4 5 6 8 9
#> 
#>
